happy.data: I'm glad to hear your happy voice
Must you had a great day
Cool, enjoy your day
Awesome keep it up
Well that makes me happy too :)
Keep going and reach heights
Well your are making me also happy:)
Well done be happy forever like this
Wow, happy life is in the peace of mind
Be happy, be bright, be you
You deserve to be happy. Dont let anyone forgot about that
Spread more happiness :)
Be happy and stay blessed always
Happiness is like sweets that you want to share with others to make there life happy
You can feel happiness and understand how beautiful it is to live cheerfully
Put a seat belt and enjoy this rollercoaster life that is full of happiness
Happy life is the peace of mind
Expand your happiness by sharing it with. The larger a rainbow,more brightly it shines
Life is an unlimited package of happiness, enjoy it
Happiness is the best makeup

Open your heart to happiness.
 Let every pore absorb light.
 Swim in the joy of the here and now,
 And cast off the darkness of night

H is for the Humor you spread with your verse.
 A for your Amusing tales, all so diverse.
 P is for Pleasure; you always delight.
 P for your Passion to make the day bright.
 I for your Incredible gift of the pen.
 N is for the Naughtiness loosed now and then.
 E is for Entertaining us all with your guile.
 S is your Saucy and impudent style and
 S is your Skill in making us smile.

Happiness is the spontaneous feeling of joy
 That comes from knowing
 You are doing the right thing
 And leading a divine life.

I love everybody;
 Therefore
 I am happy.
 I think of God every day, everywhere;
 Therefore I am happy.
 I am happy, I am always happy
 Because
 Heaven lives for the cries of my heart
 And Earth lives for the smiles of my soul.

I am happy and fulfilled
 Because I have learnt
 To face life
 As it is.

If you want to remain happy,
 Always follow the starlit footsteps
 Of your soul.

A happy life is the clear indication
 Of a tamed mind
 And disciplined thoughts.

Happiness
 Is extremely proud of living inside
 Divine thoughts.

A happy heart
 Is definitely an indication
 Of a disciplined mind.

Only happiness
 Has the capacity
 To accept the whole world
 As its own, very own.

No matter what your mind tells you,
 Keep yourself always happy, happier
 And happiest
 In your gratitude-heart-garden.

Our heart has to be
 Always as happy
 As now and as the morning rainbow.

Happiness is
 The heartâ€™s great contribution
 To life.

I am so happy that my soul
 Is extremely strict with me
 And gives me no opportunity
 To choose anything.

Let happiness be the king
 In your inner life of aspiration
 And your outer life of dedication.

Happiness is the capacity
 That we have
 To chase away
 Our negativity-mind.So,always be happy

Happiness is composed of
 A simplicity-mind,
 A sincerity-heart
 And a purity-life.

Be happy!
 Be happy!
 You will always have time
 To be unhappy later.

A happiness-heart
 Knows how to blend
 And how to bend
 At any time.

Only a happiness-smile
 From our heart
 Can cure our outer life.
